  • Create
      Its Simple! Send us your button design using one of the options below.

      Design Your Buttons Online

      Design your own buttons using our online design studio. Use this option to order immediately!

      Upload an Image

      Upload pictures or designs you created yourself. One of our artists will review your design for proper setup.

      Let us Design Your Buttons

      Tell us what your your buttons should look like. We will design them for FREE!

      Email us your design idea

      You can always just email us details on how you want your buttons to look.

      Mail us your design idea

      Send your pictures or ideas by regular mail (snail mail).

      Download a Template

      Save Time if you are able to design professionally by following these instructions.



      All services are FREE! Setup your artwork first, then pay for your buttons when you are ready.

Upload Files

Size Limit: 25 MB - If your design is larger: Email your design to order@wackybuttons.com

Add words or Comments:

If you want to add words to your picture, or have us redesign anything, please use the this form instead.

  • After you fill out this form, one of our artists will review your design and make any adjustments if needed
  • We will do our best to make the image you send best fit a round button
  • Send as many designs as you want for FREE
  • For several designs, you can submit this form over and over for each design you want to submit
  • You can also put several designs in a compressed zip file and submit the .zip file using this form
  • File types we accept: .bmp, .jpg, .png, .pdf, .eps, .psd, .ai, .tif, .tga, .pbm, .pcx, .doc, .pub, .lbl, .dcm, and more
  • We prefer your image to be circular but we will still accept square images too
  • For fastest response time we recommend designing your buttons using one of our templates
  • If you want to add words to your picture, or have us redesign anything, please use the "Let us design it" form
  • After our artist reviews your design, you will receive an email with a preview of your button design along with instructions on how to order
